nodes.text: About a hundred years before the Galactic Civil War, a group of Jedi Knights intervened on the misty planet Dathomir to deal with a clan of Nightsisters. At least one of the Sisters was able to escape the Jedi by stowing away on a starship that had docked on Dathomir.
This Jedi intervention was only mentioned in "Elle", a roleplaying adventure published in the 109st issue of the French gaming magazine Casus Belli.
